summary: About 1 in 5 undergraduates were raising children in 2015-16, according to the Education Department. Child care costs can make it harder for them to graduate. An Education program helps students with low incomes pay for child care. Among other things, we found: Education is not accurately calculating program outcomes, such as the graduation rate. Student parents may be eligible for bigger loans to cover...
title: Higher Education: More Information Could Help Student Parents Access Additional Federal Student Aid
